\begin{document}
\begin{CJK}{UTF8}{gbsn}%
\title{现代分析试题}
\maketitle
\begin{problem}
设$\mathcal{E}_{1},\mathcal{E}_{2},\cdots,\mathcal{E}_{n}$为$\left(X,\mathscr{A},\mu\right)$中的可测子集族,
其中每个$\mathcal{E}_{i}$都是$\pi$-系(即有限交封闭). 假设对于任意的$A_{1}\in\mathcal{E}_{1},\cdots,A_{n}\in\mathcal{E}_{n}$有
\[
\mu\left(\bigcap_{i=1}^{n}A_{i}\right)=\prod_{i=1}^{n}\mu\left(A_{i}\right).
\]
证明, 对于任意的$B_{1}\in\sigma\left(\mathcal{E}_{1}\right),\cdots,B_{n}\in\sigma\left(\mathcal{E}_{n}\right)$有
\[
\mu\left(\bigcap_{i=1}^{n}B_{i}\right)=\prod_{i=1}^{n}\mu\left(B_{i}\right).
\]
\end{problem}
%
\begin{problem}
设$1\le p<\infty$, $\left\{ f_{n}\right\} _{1}^{\infty}$是$L^{p}\left(\Omega,\mu\right)$中序列,
$\Omega$为$\RR^{d}$中有界集, $\mu$为Lebesgue测度, $f$为可测函数, $f_{n}\to f\ a.e.$且对于任意$\varepsilon>0$,
存在$\delta_{\varepsilon}>0$, 使得对于任意的可测集$E$, 只要$\mu\left(E\right)\le\delta_{\varepsilon}$,
便有
\[
\int_{E}\left|f_{n}\right|^{p}\ud\mu\le\varepsilon,\quad\forall n.
\]
证明$f_{n}$在$L^{p}$中收敛于$f$.
\end{problem}
%
\begin{problem}
设$K\in L^{1}\left(\left[0,1\right]^{2}\right)$, 若对于任意的$f\in C_{\left[0,1\right]}$,
有
\[
\int_{\left[0,1\right]}K\left(x,y\right)f\left(y\right)\ud y=0,\ a.e.\ x\in\left[0,1\right].
\]
证明$K\left(x,y\right)=0,\ a.e.$
\end{problem}
%
\begin{problem}
在$\left[0,1\right]$上构造一个连续函数序列$f_{n}$, 使得$0\le f_{n}\le1$, 且
\[
\lim_{n\to\infty}\int_{0}^{1}f_{n}\left(x\right)\ud x=0,
\]
但对于任何$x\in\left[0,1\right]$, $\left\{ f_{n}\left(x\right)\right\} $都不收敛.
\end{problem}
%
\begin{problem}
证明:
\end{problem}
\begin{enumerate}
\item 设$f\in L^{1}\left(0,1\right)$, $g$是周期为$1$的连续函数, 证明
\[
\lim_{n\to\infty}\int_{0}^{1}f\left(x\right)g\left(nx\right)\ud x=\int_{0}^{1}f\ud x\int_{0}^{1}g\ud x,
\]
并给出Riemann-Lebesgue引理, 及
\[
\lim_{n\to\infty}\int_{0}^{1}f\left(x\right)\left|\sin\left(nx\right)\right|\ud x,\ \ \lim_{n\to\infty}\int_{0}^{1}f\left(x\right)\sin^{2}\left(nx\right)\ud x
\]
的值.
\item 设$\left\{ n_{k}\right\} $为递增正整数序列, $E$是$\left(-\pi,\pi\right)$中使序列$\left\{ \sin n_{k}x\right\} $收敛的$x$的点集.
证明$E$是Lebesgue零测集.
\end{enumerate}
\end{CJK}

\end{document}
